feed.title: Yi-Hau Lai
feed.subtitle: I am completing my Master's in Robotics and Autonomous Systems at Arizona State University. At [Dreamslab (ASU)](https://dreams-lab.replit.app/), advised by [Jnaneshwar Das](https://search.asu.edu/profile/3327973), I currently lead the final phase of the NASA Lunar Autonomy Challenge, focusing on autonomous navigation and robotic perception. My research includes engineering an autonomous UAV integrating LiDAR-Inertial-Visual SLAM with ROS2 and PX4 for 3D reconstruction tasks. Previously, I conducted research at the [Robots and Medical Mechatronics Lab](http://rmml.bime.ntu.edu.tw/nturmmle.html) at NTU, advised by [Ping-Lang Yen](http://rmml.bime.ntu.edu.tw/profe.html).
